choose.when: SELECT approval_box_id,approval_box_name FROM approval_box WHERE box_delete_status != 1;
choose.otherwise: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name FROM approval_box ab join box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id join company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND c.comp_id = #{company};

mapper.select: SELECT ab.approval_box_id, c.comp_id,c.comp_name, ab.approval_box_name, ab.approval_box_used_status, ab.menu_using_range, ab.sort_order FROM approval_box ab JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id JOIN company c ON (c.comp_id = bud.use_id AND using_category = 'C') AND ab.approval_box_id =#{boxId};
mapper.update: UPDATE approval_box SET box_delete_status=1 WHERE approval_box_id = #{boxId};
mapper.select: select cc.code_id, cc.code_value from common_code cc join approval_box_view_item abvi on (abvi.code_id = cc.code_id and cc.section_id=004) join approval_box ab on ab.approval_box_id = abvi.approval_box_id where ab.approval_box_id = #{boxId};
select c.comp_id from company c join organization_user ou on c.comp_name = ou.comp_name join user u on u.user_id = ou.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name FROM approval_box ab JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id LEFT JOIN company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' LEFT JOIN establishment e ON bud.use_id = e.est_id AND bud.using_category = 'E' LEFT JOIN department d ON bud.use_id = d.dept_id AND bud.using_category = 'D' LEFT JOIN user u ON bud.use_id = u.user_id AND bud.using_category = 'U' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND (c.comp_id = #{company} OR d.dept_id=#{deptId} OR u.user_id = #{userId});

SELECT ab.approval_box_id, ab.approval_box_name, cc.code_id, cc.code_value FROM common_code cc join approval_box_view_item abvi on (abvi.code_id = cc.code_id and cc.section_id=004) join approval_box ab on ab.approval_box_id = abvi.approval_box_id JOIN box_use_department bud ON bud.approval_box_id = ab.approval_box_id LEFT JOIN company c ON bud.use_id = c.comp_id AND bud.using_category = 'C' LEFT JOIN establishment e ON bud.use_id = e.est_id AND bud.using_category = 'E' LEFT JOIN department d ON bud.use_id = d.dept_id AND bud.using_category = 'D' LEFT JOIN user u ON bud.use_id = u.user_id AND bud.using_category = 'U' WHERE ab.box_delete_status != 1 AND (c.comp_id = #{company} OR d.dept_id=#{deptId} OR u.user_id = #{userId});
